name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 corresponds to the Attack command.
((a.atk / 16) + 1) * a.atk * ((265 - b.def) / 256) * 20 / 16
(a.weaponAttack() - b.def) * a.atk

name: Guard
note: Skill #2 corresponds to the Guard command.

things above skills when you open the menu.
